akas: Mehmed: Bir Cihan Fatihi Turkey (Turkish title) (new title)
akas from release info: Mehmed: Bir Cihan Fatihi Turkey (Turkish title) (new title)

1.title: 1.Bölüm
1.plot: Sehzade Mehmed leaves from Manisa to Edirne accede to the throne after the death of his father Murad Han. The other candidate of the throne, Sehzade Orhan, is in Konstantiniyye at this time. Emperor Konstantinos wants to transfer Sehzade Orhan to the head of the Ottoman Empire and decides to send him to Edirne. Who will support the Çandarli Halil Pasa's throne in Edirne will lead to a new era in the Ottoman Empire.

2.title: 2.Bölüm
2.plot: Mehmed came back to the city where he had been lowered from the throne years ago. The memories of his childhood years in Edirne are like a nightmare. Mehmed thinks about what he will judge about the Çandarli, which he sees as the reason. On the other hand, Mehmed go in search of after Sehzade Orhan. When Orhan takes refuge in the Byzantine soil, all the balances change. When the Ottomans and Byzantines came to the brink of war, the decision of Sultan Mehmed would change the course of the history.

3.title: 3.Bölüm
3.plot: Sultan Mehmed Han is determined to conquer Konstantiniyye. Melike is not pleased with Eleni, who is around Sultan Mehmed Han. She wonders for what purpose Eleni is. Sultan Mehmed Han is not afraid of the conquest attempts that failed 28 times. And in the 29th conquest test he want reach of success. Time for hunting for Mehmed and Delibas. What purpose will their arrival reach in the face of difficult task?

4.title: 4.Bölüm
4.plot: Will Mehmed learn the dirty games that are turned around? Çandarli Halil Pasha is trying to understand what Mehmed is after. Konstantinos is trying to prevent people from leaving the city by closing the doors of the whole city. Mara Hatun is warned by Theodara because of great danger. But Mara Hatun tries to find out what is happening by bringing a dagger to Teodara's throat, which she does not know. Mehmed gets information about the traitor in Ottoman Palace. Mehmed, who learns that a high-ranking person helps Prince Orhan, is in great curiosity and doubt.

5.title: 5.Bölüm
5.plot: Mehmed finds out that Aksemseddin is the one who released Orhan. Sultan Mehmed Han, who learns what Melike did, shows his anger in the strictest sense. There is nothing that Melike can do other than silence, accepting her fault in the face of Mehmed's strict attitude. There is a great secret that Zaganos Pasha knows about Mehmed and intends to use it as a trump card. Mehmed's mentor Aksemseddin tells him why he freed Orhan. Mehmed will focus on his real purpose after listening.

6.title: 6.Bölüm-Final
6.plot: The Byzantine Empire is trying to take measures against Mehmed. Mehmed takes action for the dream of Konstantiniyye. Sultan Mehmed Han continues his moves for the dream of Constantinople. The Byzantine Emperor Constantine, the secret execution plan, continues exactly as he wishes. The prince Orhan is on the verge of doing business with Konstantinos. The rise of Mehmed, makes all everyone nervous. On the other hand, Eleni beside Mehmed attracts the reaction of the Byzantine Empire. They think that Eleni helped Mehmed against them. Evdokya is appointed to squeeze Eleni ...

imdb.plot outline: Constantinople has been besieged many times over the centuries; but neither the bulls were able to open a single breach in their strong walls, nor did the giant chain of Golden Horn embark on the enemy ships. Moreover, If Mehmed wants to get this city, he has to fight not only against the Byzantine Empire and the Christian world behind him, but also against the greatest opposition in the state, Çandarli Halil Pasha. This great Sultan, far beyond his age, advances by his brilliant intelligence, his military and strategic genius, his belief in wisdom and victory, and overcoming all kinds of obstacles. Two years after you ascend the throne, the city envelops, conquering Constantinople by achieving the so-called "impossibility" after a siege lasting only 53 days. He carries out the biggest dream and prints his name on history. After that day Sultan Mehmed Khan, who is known as Conqueror, sets the foundations of a great World Empire, which will govern the gate of a new age and control the continent for centuries.
imdb.title: Fatih
plot: _Fatih_ (qv) series will be about the life of Ottoman sultan _Fatih_ (qv) Sultan Mehmet.::ahmetkozan

Constantinople has been besieged many times over the centuries; but neither the bulls were able to open a single breach in their strong walls, nor did the giant chain of Golden Horn embark on the enemy ships. Moreover, If Mehmed wants to get this city, he has to fight not only against the Byzantine Empire and the Christian world behind him, but also against the greatest opposition in the state, Çandarli Halil Pasha. This great Sultan, far beyond his age, advances by his brilliant intelligence, his military and strategic genius, his belief in wisdom and victory, and overcoming all kinds of obstacles. Two years after you ascend the throne, the city envelops, conquering Constantinople by achieving the so-called "impossibility" after a siege lasting only 53 days. He carries out the biggest dream and prints his name on history. After that day Sultan Mehmed Khan, who is known as Conqueror, sets the foundations of a great World Empire, which will govern the gate of a new age and control the continent for centuries.::ahmetkozan
